app_descript:
Brief:
LivU remolds the way people connect online by offering an array of real-time interactive features, tailored to create an engaging and protective social sphere. With just a single tap, you can discover new friends, communicate in your preferred method, and immerse yourself in a world of spontaneous video matches and text chats.

Â

ğŸ“Œ Video Filters & Beauty Effects: Spice up chats with extensive video filters and beauty effects.

ğŸ“Œ Unlimited Text Chat: Keep the conversation alive with unlimited messaging and friend connections.
